posts.post_content:
I would like to make a trade with anyone willing to part with specific, low grade, 1952 Topps high numbers.  Looking for authentic or 10/1 cards with no pieces missing of the following players from the '52 set:  322 Jackson, 328 Borkowski, 330 Lown, 332 Bartirome, 335 Lepcio, 343 Gernert, 348 Kelly, 353 Del Greco, 355 Morgan, 369 Groat, 404 Brodowski. I want any two of these in low grade for the OJ.

Or, asking $175.

Email me at [url]rgncubs@att.net[/url] for trade or purchase.

posts.post_title: 1887 N172 Old Judge Fred Pfeffer SGC30
posts.post_content:
Hi Fred,

Super looking Old Judge... do you have a scan of the back available?
Thanks,

Rick.
